# Introduction

This page collects materials for the data-driven assignments in the Fall 2023 edition of Psycholinguistics at UCR.
You can also access the related files directly on [Github](https://github.com/ucrdatacenter/projects).

Data Center office hours will be announced soon; to schedule an individual meeting, please email [ucrdatacenter@ucr.nl](mailto:ucrdatacenter@ucr.nl).
